Text: Plenty of subtitles in the torrent.  BUT, the main avi file has hardcoded (Spanish) subtitles which makes it a bit hard to change to english, or another.

foz405,
This torrent DON'T HAVE HARDCODED SUBTITLES!!!!!! All the subs are .srt files (softsubs)!!!!
You just need to open your preferred .srt file in your player to see your favorite language...
